snippet.title: Spectre - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
If you've been missing Splinter Cell - and in particular its unique Spies vs. Mercenaries asymmetrical multiplayer mode - then Spectre might be the game for you. Spectre is due out on PC by the end of 2021. Check it out on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1531020/SPECTRE/

#IGN #Gaming #Spectre
